item.title: Creating fast presentations using orgmode and reveal
item.description: Introduction In this brief post I’ll explain how to create fast presentations using emacs + orgmode + reveal. Requisites emacs orgmode ox-reveal Installing OX-Reveal OX-Reveal module creates a new entry in the export menu to convert your Org file to Reveal.
